decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using Deadpool, Trading Card as the commander. It includes a variety of powerful creatures, removal spells, and disruption to quickly pressure the opponent and control the game. The deck aims to consistently apply pressure to the opponent's life total while disrupting their game plan with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize. By combining efficient creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Pyrokinesis with powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. Additionally, the deck includes graveyard recursion with cards like Animate Dead and Unearth to provide additional value and keep the pressure on the opponent.

The deck revolves around using a combination of creatures, spells, and mana ramp to quickly set up a powerful board state and execute a game-winning combo. It focuses on utilizing reanimation spells like Animate Dead and Necromancy to bring back key creatures like Archon of Cruelty or Razaketh, the Foulblooded. The deck also includes powerful tutors like Demonic Tutor and Worldly Tutor to search for combo pieces and disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay to control the opponent's game plan. With a mix of efficient ramp creatures like Elves of Deep Shadow and powerful finishers like Grist, the Hunger Tide, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful synergies.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays with the use of powerful partner commanders, Bruse Tarl and Yoshimaru. It aims to overwhelm opponents quickly with a mix of efficient creatures and removal spells. The deck includes a variety of combat tricks and equipment to enhance the attacking capabilities of its creatures. It also utilizes land destruction and disruptive elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck is designed to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out games before they have a chance to stabilize. By combining the abilities of the commanders with a well-rounded creature base and support spells, this deck aims to be a relentless and aggressive force on the battlefield.

The deck revolves around utilizing aggressive creatures and powerful spells to control the board and pressure opponents quickly. It includes a mix of low-cost spells like Lightning Bolt and Force Spike to disrupt opponents, along with efficient threats like True-Name Nemesis and Brazen Borrower to apply pressure. The deck also includes powerful control elements such as Force of Will and Teferi, Time Raveler to protect its creatures and disrupt opponents' game plans. By combining a fast-paced aggro strategy with efficient control elements, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents and secure victory in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format game.

This deck revolves around using Azusa, Lost but Seeking to ramp up quickly and control the board through land destruction and recursion. It focuses on utilizing unique lands to generate mana and disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck includes cards that allow for explosive plays such as Primeval Titan and Emrakul, the Promised End, as well as ways to tutor for specific lands or creatures like Expedition Map and Worldly Tutor. By establishing a strong mana base and leveraging Azusa's ability to play additional lands, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and spells while keeping them on the back foot with land denial tactics.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of disruption, removal, and powerful creatures. Kyodai, Soul of Kamigawa leads the charge as the commander, offering a versatile and resilient threat. The deck includes a mix of counterspells (Force of Will, Mana Leak), removal spells (Abrupt Decay, Swords to Plowshares), and versatile creatures (Brazen Borrower, Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student). Mana efficiency is key, with a strong mana base featuring fetch lands and dual lands to ensure smooth and consistent mana development. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan, protect key threats, and out-value them in the long game to secure victory in a 1 vs 1 duel.

This deck focuses on utilizing the aggressive capabilities of Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd to overwhelm opponents with a mix of creatures and disruptive spells. Key cards like Mother of Runes and Giver of Runes protect your creatures and enable aggressive attacks, while cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Containment Priest disrupt your opponent's game plan. Aether Vial and cards like Recruiter of the Guard and Ranger-Captain of Eos help to quickly build a board presence. Removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Path to Exile keep your opponent's threats in check. The deck also includes utility lands like Eiganjo Castle and Tectonic Edge to further support your game plan. By combining aggro creatures with disruptive elements, this deck aims to close out games quickly and efficiently.
